speaker: Mia
text: Hey, are you still planning to join the hackathon this Saturday?
ipa: heɪ | ɑɹ jʊ stɪl ˈplænɪŋ tə ʤɔɪn ðə ˈhækəˌθɑn ðɪs ˈsæɾɚˌdeɪ
stress: Hey | are you STILL PLANNING to JOIN the HACKATHON this SATURDAY
linking:
"planning to" → /ˈplænɪŋ tə/ (ng to vowel)
"join the" → /ʤɔɪn ðə/ (n + th)

speaker: Lucas
text: Yeah, I hope to submit a working prototype by the end of the event. I managed to finish most of the backend yesterday.
ipa: jæ | aɪ hoʊp tə səbˈmɪt ə ˈwɝkɪŋ ˈpɹoʊtəˌtaɪp baɪ ði ɛnd əv ði ɪˈvɛnt | aɪ ˈmænɪʤd tə ˈfɪnɪʃ moʊst əv ðə ˈbækˌɛnd ˈjɛstɚˌdeɪ
stress: Yeah | I HOPE to SUBMIT a WORKING PROTOTYPE by the END of the EVENT | I MANAGED to FINISH MOST of the BACKEND yesterday
linking:
"hope to" → /hoʊp tə/ (to reduced)
"submit a" → /səbˈmɪt ə/ (t + a)
"managed to" → /ˈmænɪʤd tə/ (d + to)

speaker: Mia
text: That's awesome! I decided to work on a different project, though. I just couldn't help thinking about that mobile app idea we talked about last week.
ipa: ðæts ˈɑsəm | aɪ dɪˈsaɪdɪd tə wɝk ɑn ə ˈdɪfɚənt ˈpɹɑʤɛkt ðoʊ | aɪ ʤəst ˈkʊdnt hɛlp ˈθɪŋkɪŋ əˈbaʊt ðæt ˈmoʊbəl æp aɪˈdiə wi tɔkt əˈbaʊt læst wik
stress: That's AWESOME | I DECIDED to WORK on a DIFFERENT PROJECT, though | I just COULDN'T HELP THINKING about that MOBILE APP IDEA we TALKED about LAST WEEK
linking:
"decided to" → /dɪˈsaɪdɪd tə/ (d + to)
"help thinking" → /hɛlp ˈθɪŋkɪŋ/ (p + th)

speaker: Lucas
text: Oh, nice. Are you going to work alone?
ipa: oʊ naɪs | ɑɹ jʊ ˈɡoʊɪŋ tə wɝk əˈloʊn
stress: Oh, NICE | Are you GOING to WORK ALONE
linking:
"going to" → /ˈɡoʊɪŋ tə/ (ng to vowel)
"work alone" → /wɝk əˈloʊn/ (k + a)

speaker: Mia
text: I offered to team up with Elena, but she refused to participate. She said she couldn't stand working under pressure like that.
ipa: aɪ ˈɑfɚd tə tim ʌp wɪð ɪˈleɪnə | bət ʃi ɹɪˈfjuzd tə pɑɹˈtɪsəˌpeɪt | ʃi sɛd ʃi ˈkʊdnt stænd ˈwɝkɪŋ ˈʌndɚ ˈpɹɛʃɚ laɪk ðæt
stress: I OFFERED to TEAM UP with ELENA | but she REFUSED to PARTICIPATE | she SAID she COULDN'T STAND WORKING under PRESSURE like THAT
linking:
"offered to" → /ˈɑfɚd tə/ (d + to)
"working under" → /ˈwɝkɪŋ ˈʌndɚ/ (ng to vowel)

speaker: Lucas
text: Haha, fair enough. I suggested asking James to join me, but he insisted on taking the weekend off completely. He's been thinking about moving to a different team, so I guess he wants a break.
ipa: ˈhɑˌhɑ | fɛɹ əˈnʌf | aɪ səɡˈʤɛstɪd ˈæskɪŋ ʤeɪmz tə ʤɔɪn mi | bət hi ɪnˈsɪstɪd ɑn ˈteɪkɪŋ ðə ˈwikˌɛnd ɑf kəmˈpliːtli | hiz bɪn ˈθɪŋkɪŋ əˈbaʊt ˈmuvɪŋ tə ə ˈdɪfɚənt tim | soʊ aɪ ɡɛs hi wɑnts ə bɹeɪk
stress: Haha | FAIR ENOUGH | I SUGGESTED ASKING James to JOIN me | but he INSISTED on TAKING the WEEKEND OFF completely | He's been THINKING about MOVING to a DIFFERENT TEAM | so I GUESS he WANTS a BREAK
linking:
"asking James" → /ˈæskɪŋ ʤeɪmz/ (ng + j)
"moving to" → /ˈmuvɪŋ tə/ (ng + t)

speaker: Mia
text: Makes sense. I prefer working with a small team anyway — less chaos. Oh, and I intend to submit my project to that startup competition next month too.
ipa: meɪks sɛns | aɪ pɹəˈfɝ ˈwɝkɪŋ wɪð ə smɔl tim ˈɛniˌweɪ — lɛs ˈkeɪˌɑs | oʊ | ənd aɪ ɪnˈtɛnd tə səbˈmɪt maɪ ˈpɹɑʤɛkt tə ðæt ˈstɑɹˌtʌp ˌkɑmpəˈtɪʃən nɛkst mʌnθ tu
stress: Makes SENSE | I PREFER WORKING with a SMALL TEAM anyway — less CHAOS | Oh | and I INTEND to SUBMIT my PROJECT to that STARTUP COMPETITION next MONTH too
linking:
"intend to" → /ɪnˈtɛnd tə/ (d + t)
"submit my" → /səbˈmɪt maɪ/ (t + m)

speaker: Lucas
text: Wow, ambitious! Don't forget to back up your files often. I remember losing my entire project once because I forgot to save it properly.
ipa: waʊ æmˈbɪʃəs | doʊnt fɚˈɡɛt tə ˈbæk ʌp jɚ faɪlz ˈɑfən | aɪ ɹɪˈmɛmbɚ ˈluːzɪŋ maɪ ɛnˈtaɪɚ ˈpɹɑʤɛkt wəns bɪˈkəz aɪ fɚˈɡɑt tə seɪv ɪt ˈpɹɑpɚli
stress: Wow, AMBITIOUS | Don't FORGET to BACK UP your FILES often | I REMEMBER LOSING my ENTIRE PROJECT once because I FORGOT to SAVE it PROPERLY
linking:
"forget to" → /fɚˈɡɛt tə/ (t + t)
"save it" → /seɪv ɪt/ (v + i)

speaker: Mia
text: Ouch. I imagine feeling so frustrated. By the way, if you want, I can help you set up your frontend faster.
ipa: aʊʧ | aɪ ɪˈmæʤɪn ˈfilɪŋ soʊ ˈfɹʌˌstreɪtɪd | baɪ ðə weɪ | ɪf jʊ wɑnt | aɪ kən hɛlp jʊ sɛt ʌp jɚ ˈfɹʌnˌtɛnd ˈfæstɚ
stress: Ouch | I IMAGINE FEELING so FRUSTRATED | By the way | if you WANT | I can HELP you SET UP your FRONTEND FASTER
linking:
"help you" → /hɛlp jʊ/ (p + y)
"set up" → /sɛt ʌp/ (t + u)

speaker: Lucas
text: Really? Thanks! I can't stand dealing with CSS — it always breaks everything!
ipa: ˈɹɪli | θæŋks | aɪ kænt stænd ˈdiːlɪŋ wɪð ˈsiːɛsɛs — ɪt ˈɔlweɪz bɹeɪks ˈɛvɚˌθɪŋ
stress: Really? Thanks | I CAN'T STAND DEALING with CSS — it ALWAYS BREAKS EVERYTHING
linking:
"dealing with" → /ˈdiːlɪŋ wɪð/ (ng to vowel)
"breaks everything" → /bɹeɪks ˈɛvɚˌθɪŋ/ (s + e)

speaker: Mia
text: No worries. I actually enjoy fixing those little layout bugs.
ipa: noʊ ˈwɝriz | aɪ ˈækʧuəli ɪnˈʤɔɪ ˈfɪksɪŋ ðoʊz ˈlɪɾl ˈleɪˌaʊt bʌɡz
stress: No WORRIES | I ACTUALLY ENJOY FIXING those LITTLE LAYOUT BUGS

speaker: Lucas
text: You're a lifesaver. Maybe next time I’ll offer to help you debug some backend stuff.
ipa: jʊɹ ə ˈlaɪfˌseɪvɚ | ˈmeɪbi nɛkst taɪm aɪl ˈɑfɚ tə hɛlp jʊ diˈbʌɡ səm ˈbækˌɛnd stʌf
stress: You're a LIFESAVER | Maybe NEXT TIME I’LL OFFER to HELP you DEBUG some BACKEND STUFF
linking:
"help you" → /hɛlp jʊ/ (p + y)
"debug some" → /diˈbʌɡ səm/ (g + s)
